comment: Dr. Powell was a fantastic teacher to have. She was very clear about what was due and when and was always available through email should you need assistance with something. It was a very easy course and I 100% recommend her if you are looking for a good teacher.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Online Savvy

comment: GREAT Professor! HIGHLYYYY recommend, don't miss that chance! Super kind and sweet. She is super clear about grading and makes time to communicate with students. Just stay on top of deadlines and you will be fine!
rating_tags: Group projects--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Took this class online, Professor was kind and caring, but not very tech savvy. I think she had emails on auto because if I didn't log into class for a certain amount of time, she would email and then say disregard. Class material was easy, discussion/response every other week and modules every week. Very lenient grader. Easy A.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Caring
